description: '''Ahidus''' ({{Langx|ber|ⴰⵃⵉⴷⵓⵙ|aḥidous}}), also sometimes called '''ahidous,''' '''haidous, tahidoust or hidoussi''', is a [[Berbers|Berber]] style of collective performance in [[Morocco]]. It is the traditional dance in many [[Berbers|Berber]] tribes and is known to be the favorite entertainment of these tribes.
